Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits price gouging with respect to medical supplies during a public health emergency
Summary: Prohibits price gouging with respect to medical supplies during a public health emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง396-rrr, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting price gouging with respect to medical supplies during a public health emergency
